name: thunder-stone
effect:
Used on a party Pokémon
:   Evolves an eelektrik into eelektross, an eevee into jolteon, or a pikachu into raichu.
short_effect: Evolves an Eelektrik into Eelektross, an Eevee into Jolteon, or a Pikachu into Raichu.
